column5: From the US side perspective perhaps they are down trying to stop the gigantic mess on our southern border?

If announcements are coming, I assume both sides of the border have been operating with reduced border agent staffing. Typically I have seen return to work announcements to those who have been furloughed in the past so I wonder how much notice must be provided in their contracts?You would think they would need to return for additional training in new protocols for testing & inspection so if things were going to open up soon, they would be notified or preparing to return to work.

Rich: I certainly agree - I'm sure the agents are going to have a complete NEW line of questions for us as we try to enter Canada............. AND: I also am very certain that the new "entry policy" is going to just make the lines longer as we try to enter Canada.
They'll be lined up clear back to Cloquet !

Maybe Canada will be smart enough to offer reserved crossing times for a price, similar to Disney and Great America parks. Just drive on past all those waiting in line with your preferred crossing reservation in hand.
It's not open, they have plenty of time for training.
Won't be long now,n.w Ontario lookout here we come!!
Thatâ€™s a fact Ontario is moving to stage 3 5 days earlier than expected. Something positive will happen before summers end
Border agent needs to ask 3 questions,,,,,are you vaccinated,yes,,,,your passport,yes,,,,do you have lots of money,,,yes a sht load,,,have a great trip,,,easy as that.
You got it Rod.My pockets are dusty lol.
Can't run around in that guide boat forever with just you in it,it needs a pay day and also john you need to get back to netting a bunch of fish,your skills might be getting alittle rusty lol
